recipes.name: scrambledEggs
instructions: Add eggs to pan when hot
Gather eggs into curds, remove when cooked

recipes.name: garlicPasta
instructions: Remove pasta from water and mix with garlic olive oil

recipes.name: chai
ingredients: 2 tea bags or 20 g loose tea leaves
instructions: Add tea leaves/tea bags, chai masala; mix and steep for 3-4 minutes
Remove mixture from heat; strain and enjoy
